children.text: Select an email address to extract company details
Please enter your Clearbit account's API key from your API dashboard

API Dashboard: dashboard.clearbit.com/api

API Authentication Docs: dashboard.clearbit.com/docs#authentication

API Docs: dashboard.clearbit.com/docs

1. Register for a free Clearbit account to receive your API Key. 
2. Edit the datasource for this app to add your API, then save the datasource.
